landing_page.main_title: Organize Your Thoughts and Tasks Effortlessly
landing_page.description: Notz is a minimalist and powerful solution for note-taking and task management. Capture your ideas, track your projects, and stay focused.

login_signup.enter_your_credentials: Enter your credentials to get started.
login_signup.name: Name

notifications.invalid_credentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
notifications.email_in_use: This email address is already in use.
notifications.registration_failed: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
notifications.registration_success: Account created successfully! Redirecting to the login page...
notifications.session_not_found: An error was encountered while retrieving session information. Please try again later.
notifications.not_found_or_unauthorized: Item not found or you are not authorized for this action.
notifications.create_note_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while creating the note.
notifications.update_note_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while editing the note.
notifications.soft_delete_note_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while moving the note to the trash.
notifications.permanent_delete_note_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while deleting the note.
notifications.soft_delete_note_success: Note successfully moved to the trash.
notifications.restore_item_unexpected_err: An error occurred while restoring the item.
notifications.permanent_delete_item_unexpected_err: An error occurred while permanently deleting the item.
notifications.create_todo_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while creating the to-do item.
notifications.update_todo_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while updating the task.
notifications.soft_delete_todo_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while moving the to-do item to the trash.
notifications.soft_delete_todo_success: To-do item successfully moved to the trash.
notifications.permanent_delete_todo_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while permanently deleting the task.
notifications.create_tag_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while creating the tag.
notifications.update_tag_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while updating the tag.
notifications.soft_delete_tag_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while moving the tag to the trash.
notifications.soft_delete_tag_success: Tag successfully moved to the trash.
notifications.permanent_delete_tag_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while permanently deleting the tag.
notifications.fetch_notes_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while loading notes.
notifications.fetch_todos_unexpected_err: An unexpected error occurred while loading todos.
notifications.empty_trash_unexpected_err: An error occurred while emptying the trash.

notes.empty_page: You don't have any notes yet. Start by clicking the 'New Note' button!
notes.create_note_dialog_desc: Add your ideas and tasks here.
notes.delete_note_confirmation_desc: This note will be moved to the trash. You can restore it later if you wish.
notes.edit_note_dialog_desc: Make changes to your note. It will be updated when you save.

trash.title: Trash
trash.permanent_delete_confirmation_desc: This action cannot be undone. This item will be permanently deleted from the database.
trash.empty_trash_confirmation_desc: This action cannot be undone. All {itemCount} items in this section will be permanently deleted.

todos.title: Todos
todos.empty_title: You don't have any tasks yet
todos.empty_description: Get started by adding a new to-do.
todos.new_todo_dialog_desc: Enter the details of your task and add it to your board.
todos.edit_todo_dialog_desc: Make changes to your task and save.
todos.delete_todo_confirmation_desc: This task will be moved to the trash. You can restore it later if you wish.

tags.title: Tags
tags.empty_page: You don't have any tags yet. Start by clicking the 'New Tag' button!
tags.new_tag_dialog_desc: Organize your notes and tasks by entering the details of your tag.
tags.edit_tag_dialog_desc: Make changes to your tag and save.
tags.delete_tag_confirmation_desc: This tag will be moved to the trash. It will be removed from any notes and tasks that have it.
